page.title: 10HEALTH CARE
page.content: The health of the people of this area is well taken care of. There are two main health centres,one each in Sandhurst and Yateley with additional surgeries in the area, with nurses and doctors in daily attendance who provide not only routine medical care but a certain amount of emergency help. There are two opticians as well as three dental surgeries.There is no longer a hospital in Yateley but Frimley Park close by is modern and very well equipped with an accident and emergency department and specialist care departments too. Other hospitals nearby are two at Reading and one in Aldershot providing not only routine hospital care, but specialist facilities too.
